hooks.command: echo "$CLAUDE_BASH_COMMAND" | grep -qE 'rm -rf /|rm -rf ~|DROP TABLE' && echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous command' && exit 2 || exit 0

case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.py) black --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; isort --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null ;; *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.vue) prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; exit 0
